author: Krisztian Sandor
title: Bitcoin Bounce Fails, Tumbling Below $100K as Iran Reportedly Prepares Retaliation Against U.S.
description: Axios reported the White House is expecting an Iranian attack against U.S. bases in the Gulf region.
content:
Cryptocurrencies gave up nearly all of their overnight bounce on during midday U.S. hours on Monday, with bitcoin 
 sliding back below $100,000 on news reports that Iran was preparing to attack U.S.… [+574 chars]
